msbt.message: Did you know that it's kind of my year right now?It doesn't come along too often, so when it does, I've got to take full advantage of the spotlight. Year of the !
It's my time to shine Year of the Ox, !Or, Year of the as I like to think of it.Because I'm not technically an Ox, but I deserve a year, don't I?
Did you know that it's kind of my year right now?It doesn't come along too often, so when it does, I've got to take full advantage of the spotlight. Year of the !
You know what's special about this new year, ?<10_4 /> It's MY year! That's right, the Year of the Rabbit.No tortoises in sight. It's gonna be all carrots and gravy for , baby!
It's finally here. The year of the Horse! Or, as I like to call it The yearof ! Let's get this party started at a gallop. Ha HA!
Hey, how do you think I look on this fine New Year's Day? Bigger than usual? Fluffier? Well, it's the Year of the Sheep! So, you know, I put a little extra effort in. More blow-drying.
I tell you, there's going to be plenty of -ing around this year. That's because it's the Year of the Monkey!
It's the Year of the Rooster! The year I finally stretch my wings and fly! Oh, right.
Wanna know the unofficial motto of ? "Have a Dog Gone Good Time, !" I'm trying to make it official, but you wouldn't believe the amount of paperwork involved
Guess what, . It's MY year. Finally.No more squelching in the mud for . <10_4 />OK, maybe just a little Ha HA!
